events.message: I ordered a jacket last week, but it doesn't fit at all. I want to return it and get a full refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under 'Refund' due to the customer's request for a return and refund.
Customer support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund case for this order.
Hello! This is Sarah from customer support. I’m here to help you with your return and refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the item is unused and in its original packaging?
My order number is 987654321. The jacket is unused and still has the tags. It’s in the original packaging just like you asked.
Thank you for the information. You are eligible for a full refund. Please ship the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
Great, thanks for the quick reply and clear instructions. I’ll send the jacket back today.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your full refund. You should see the amount back on your payment method within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to make sure your refund was received and if you have any further questions or need assistance?
Since there has been no response, we are closing this case. Feel free to reach out if you need anything else regarding your order.
